name: CRUSH
lyrics:
The way you′re staring at me
你盯着我的样子
Could compare to nothing
无与伦比
Oh gosh, I'm falling in deep
噢 天呐 我已陷入其中太深了
(Oh woah)
oh~
Like in the ocean
喜欢海洋
And no life that′s holding me
没有生活的羁绊
I'm drowning near you with me
我沉溺于你在我的身边
You look at me
你看向我
(Ey)



It gets harder every night
一天比一天难
(I can't deny)
（我无法否认）
Texts that you′ve seen
你看过的消息
But I can′t reply
但是我无法回复


So, alright, alright
所以，好吧，好吧
Blame it on me
都怪我
I don't get this fight, that′s right
我不懂这场比赛，好吧
Bitch you're my type
我喜欢你
Sunshine, sunshine
阳光啊，阳光啊
Shining so bright
闪耀如此亮眼
Baby, you a stalker
宝贝，你真是个跟踪狂


Got a little crush on you
我有点喜欢你
Let me love on you
让我爱你
The way you make my body move
你让我的身体动起来
This feeling is nothing new
这是感觉，这不是什么新鲜事
Take it easy
放轻松
You′re the only one I need
你是我唯一需要的人
Early morning
每天早晨
All your love and that's just it
你所有的爱 仅此而已
Crush on you
暗恋你
Crush on you
暗恋你


The way you're singing
你唱歌的方式
Just like honey, so sweet
就像蜂蜜一样甜蜜
I close my eyes and try to make me believe (believe)
我闭上眼睛 试着相信
Hope when you close you close your eyes
希望当你闭上眼睛的时候
You also see me
你也看见了我
Ev′ry single night
每个夜晚


So, It gets harder every night
所以，一天比一天难
(I can't deny)
（我无法否认）
Texts that you′ve seen
你看过的消息
But I can't reply
但是我无法回复


So, alright, alright

Blame it on me
都怪我
I don′t get this fight, that's right
我不懂这场比赛，好吧
Bitch you′re my type
我喜欢你
Sunshine, sunshine
阳光啊，阳光啊
Shining so bright
闪耀如此亮眼
Baby, you a stalker
宝贝，你真是个跟踪狂


Got a little crush on you

Let me love on you
让我爱你吧
The way you make my body move
你让我的身体动起来
This feeling is nothing new
这是感觉，这不是什么新鲜事
Take it easy
放轻松
You′re the only one I need
你是我唯一需要的人
Early morning
清晨
All your love and that′s just it
你所有的爱，仅此而已


Crush on you
暗恋你
Crush on you
暗恋你
Crush on you
暗恋你
Crush on you
暗恋你


Baby girl
女孩
You look best
你看起来超棒的
Best that I never had
是我从未拥有的
Only one
仅有一个
Need your trust
需要你的信任
Need your love
需要你的爱恋
And need that love
需要那份爱意
(Woo)



I want it
我想要
I need it
我需要
Hold you by my side, girl
让你在我身边，女孩
Ain't gonna ever let you slide (Slide, yeah)
我不会让你滑倒(滑倒，wow)
Wildflower when it jaune
黄褐色的野花
You precious
你宝贵的
Catch a light of seeing you
捕捉到看到你的光
Was the light you seeing me?
你看到我了吗?
(Mhm, Mhm)



It gets harder every night
一天比一天难
I can′t deny
我无法否认
Texts you've seen
你看过的消息
But I can′t reply
但是我无法回复


Got a little crush on you

让我爱你吧

你让我的身体动起来

这是感觉，这不是什么新鲜事
Take it easy
放轻松
You're the only one I need
你是我唯一需要的人
Early morning
清晨

你所有的爱，仅此而已


Crush on you

收起
